items.summary: Remove any remaining editor-related dependencies and references from the frontend codebase, then ensure the frontend rebuild succeeds without editor-related packages, imports, or runtime paths.

Update the existing Whisper app homepage (national hub hero section) hero headline and subtext by changing ONLY the displayed strings, keeping the exact existing design/layout/colors/buttons/functionality unchanged. In the component that renders the current homepage hero text (currently in frontend/src/App.tsx under the home route render), replace the headline and subtext with the exact new strings and add the required permanent comment immediately above the strings.
